001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003/** Class for color sensors
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 */
006@SuppressWarnings("unused")
007public class ColorSensor extends Sensor<com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorSensor> implements IColorSensor {
008
009    public int val;
010
011    /** Make a color Sensor
012     *
013     * @param device The hardware device
014     */
015    public ColorSensor(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorSensor device, String nm) {
016        super(device, nm);
017    }
018
019    /** Make a color sensor
020     *
021     * @param deviceName The device name in hardware map
022     */
023    public ColorSensor(String deviceName) {
024        super(deviceName);
025    }
026
027    @Override
028    public String LogLine() {
029        int alpha = (val >> 24) & 0xFF;
030        if (alpha != 0 && alpha != 0xFF) {
031            return logData(
032                String.format("A(%d)R(%d)G(%d)B(%d)", alpha, (val >> 16) & 0xFF, (val >> 8) & 0xFF, val & 0xFF)
033            );
034        } else {
035            return logData(String.format("R(%d)G(%d)B(%d)", (val >> 16) & 0xFF, (val >> 8) & 0xFF, val & 0xFF));
036        }
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public int argb() {
041        com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorSensor device = getRawDevice();
042        if (device != null) {
043            val = device.argb();
044        }
045        return val;
046    }
047}
